long_description: WIth white and red modes and 5 brightness levels, the Princeton Tec Sync Headlamp is versatile and easy-to-use on your backpacking and camping trips. Twist the power dial to access spot beam, flood beam and red LED; for times that require max output, turn dial to access dual beam mode (spot and flood at the same time). Outputs 90 lumens and throws a beam 58m on high and 20 lumens and 24m on low. Operates on 3 AAA batteries that provide up to 125 hrs. of use on low. Single-arm ratcheting head pivots up and down, providing a wide range of motion so you can aim the beam wherever you need it most. Large push-button switch is easily operated while wearing gloves. The Princeton Tec Sync Headlamp is designed, engineered and manufactured by Princeton Tec in New Jersey, USA.
short_description: WIth white and red modes and 5 brightness levels, the Princeton Tec Sync Headlamp is versatile and easy-to-use on your backpacking and camping trips.
